    <facet>

    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>eln:demoportal</catalog>
            <entry>1799</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="no">Akselerasjon</string>
            <string language="en">Acceleration</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Beschleunigung</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Accélération</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Acceleration</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Accelerazione</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ταχύτητα</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Aceleración</string>
          </title>
          <language>no</language>
          <description>
            <string language="no">Her kan du se en visuell fremstilling av akselerasjon. Det er vist akselerasjon ved to forskjellige skråplan.</string>
            <string language="en">Here you can see a visual demonstration of acceleration. Accelaration is shown from two different slopes.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="no">akselerasjon</string>
            <string language="en">accelaration</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Hier können Sie eine Sichtdemonstration der 
Beschleunigung sehen. Accelaration wird von zwei 
unterschiedlichen Steigungen gezeigt.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Voici que vous pouvez voir une démonstration 
visuelle de l'accélération. Accelaration est montré de deux 
pentes différentes.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Aqui você pode ver uma demonstração visual do 
acceleration. Accelaration é mostrado de duas inclinações 
diferentes.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Qui potete vedere una dimostrazione visiva di 
accelerazione. Accelaration è indicato da due pendii 
differenti.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Εδώ μπορείτε να δείτε μια οπτική επίδειξη 
της ταχύτητας. Το Accelaration εμφανίζεται από δύο 
διαφορετικές κλίσεις.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Aquí usted puede ver una demostración visual de 
la aceleración. Accelaration se muestra a partir de dos 
diversas cuestas.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">accelaration</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">accelaration</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">accelaration</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">accelaration</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">accelaration</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">accelaration</string>
